youCanWrite.message: You can write feedback on this PREreview of {preprint}.

orcidLogIn.message: We will ask you to log in with your ORCID iD. If you don’t have an iD, you can create one.

whatIsOrcid.message: An <link>ORCID iD</link> is a unique identifier that distinguishes you from everyone with the same or similar name.

carryOnMessage.message: As you’ve already started feedback on this PREreview of {preprint}, we’ll take you to the next step so you can carry on.

whatNameTitle.message: <error>Error:</error> What name would you like to use?

errorSelectName.message: <error>Error:</error> Select the name that you would like to use

whichNameTip.message: You can choose between the name on your ORCID profile or your PREreview pseudonym.

whatIsPseudonymDefinition.message: A <term>PREreview pseudonym</term> is an alternate name you can use instead of your real name. It is unique and combines a random color and animal. Your pseudonym is ‘{pseudonym}’.

whatIsPseudonymAccountability.message: Using your pseudonym, you can contribute to open preprint review without fearing retribution or judgment that may occur when using your real name. However, using a pseudonym retains an element of accountability.

linkToOrcidId.message: We’ll link your feedback to your ORCID iD.

linkToPseudonym.message: We’ll only link your feedback to others that also use your pseudonym.

errorFollowingCodeOfConduct.message: <error>Error:</error> Confirm that you are following the Code of Conduct

codeOfConductTip.message: As a member of our community, we expect you to abide by the <link>PREreview Code of Conduct</link>.

expectedBehaviorConstructive.message: Providing feedback that is constructive, i.e. useful, to the receiver.

expectedBehaviorRespectful.message: Being respectful of differing viewpoints and experiences.

expectedBehaviorCommunity.message: Focusing on what is best for the community.

expectedBehaviorEmpathy.message: Showing empathy towards other community members.

unacceptableBehaviorAttacks.message: Trolling, insulting or derogatory comments, and personal or political attacks.

unacceptableBehaviorUnconstructive.message: Providing unconstructive or disruptive feedback on PREreview.

unacceptableBehaviorConfidential.message: Publishing others’ confidential information, such as a physical or electronic address, without explicit permission.

unacceptableBehaviorSexual.message: Use of sexualized language or imagery and unwelcome sexual attention or advances.

unacceptableBehaviorOther.message: Other conduct which could reasonably be considered inappropriate in a professional setting.

followingCodeOfConduct.message: I’m following the Code of Conduct

nowPublishMessage.message: We will assign your feedback a DOI (a permanent identifier) and make it publicly available under a <license>CC BY 4.0 license</license>.

publishingSeeShortlyMessage.message: You’ll be able to see your feedback shortly.

publishedSeeShortlyMessage.message: You’ll be able to see your feedback shortly.
